View Javadoc
1   package guru.mikelue.jdut.vendor.mssql;
2   
3   import java.util.Collections;
4   import java.util.HashMap;
5   import java.util.Map;
6   
7   import guru.mikelue.jdut.operation.DataGrainOperator;
8   import guru.mikelue.jdut.operation.DefaultOperators;
9   
10  /**
11   * Pre-defined operations, features of MS SQL server.
12   */
13  public final class MsSql {
14  	private MsSql() {}
15  
16  	/**
17  	 * The default operators provided for MS SQL server.
18  	 */
19  	public final static Map<String, DataGrainOperator> DEFAULT_OPERATORS;
20  
21  	static {
22  		Map<String, DataGrainOperator> operators = new HashMap<>(1);
23  		operators.put(
24  			DefaultOperators.INSERT,
25  			new IdentityInsertOperator(DefaultOperators::doInsert)
26  				.toDataGrainOperator()
27  		);
28  		operators.put(
29  			DefaultOperators.REFRESH,
30  			new IdentityInsertOperator(DefaultOperators::doRefresh)
31  				.toDataGrainOperator()
32  		);
33  
34  		DEFAULT_OPERATORS = Collections.unmodifiableMap(operators);
35  	}
36  }
